description: p79resultgroupcl: Result group from MRD PCR on day 79, indicating the percentage of leukemia cells present (1: ≥25%, 2: ≥5%, 3: ≥0.1% - <5%, 4: <0.1%, 5: <0.1%, 8: Sample not taken, 9: No marker found and/or monitoring not feasible).

details.9: No marker found and/or monitoring not feasible
